description: Gravy Boat can read you a recipe or just the ingredients or method. You can also ask for a list of all the available recipes. Or ask how much of an individual ingredient a recipe requires. More recipes will be added soon.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask gravy boat for our pancakes recipe
Alexa ask gravy boat how many eggs are in pancakes
Alexa ask gravy boat to list all my recipes
name: Gravy Boat
shortDescription: Ask Alexa to read you a selection of recipes.
